definitions.definition: An item of clothing , covering all or part of the hand and fingers, but usually allowing independent movement of the fingers.
examples: I wore gloves to keep my hands warm.
The boxing champ laced on his gloves before the big bout.

definitions.definition: The ability to catch a hit ball.
examples: Frederico had a great glove , but he couldn't hit a curveball, so he never broke into the pros.

definitions.definition: A challenge from one to another.
examples: to throw down the glove , i.e. to offer a challenge; to take up the glove , to accept it

main_definition: ( clothing ) An item of clothing , covering all or part of the hand and fingers, but usually allowing independent movement of the fingers.
secondary_definitions: ( baseball , figuratively ) The ability to catch a hit ball.
( with definite article ) A challenge from one to another.
